svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, #121212); color-scheme: light dark;

Also view what is your subnet for IPv4 and IPv6

div.div: 2. We have to give the static IP address to whatever network interface is currently having internet, then check if the private ip of that interface has changed or not and then see if u are able to access internet or not. And also inspect in wireshark that the request are going through your static assigned IP
